section.title: Firefox 40
section.para: Fedora 23 provides the latest version of Mozilla Firefox, the world-favorite web browser. The powerful and extensible browser is kept up to date to keep your web surfing secure and smooth. For detailed information about the 40 release, see Firefox Notes.

section.title: Thunderbird 38
section.para: The Thunderbird e-mail client now includes the Lightning calendar and scheduling extension by default. Use it for todo lists, e-mailed invitations, and more. For full details on changes in Thunderbird, see the project's Release Notes.

section.title: LibreOffice 5
section.para: Fedora 23 provides LibreOffice version 5, the latest mayor release of the default office suite. Some of the features of this release are:

listitem.para: Now it is possible to crop an image with the mouse.
Data bars in rows with conditional formatting in Calc.
Improvements in handling .doc, .rtf, .xlsx and xml formats.

section.para: See the Release Notes for a comprehensive list of all new features in this release.
